content:
There is no message preview, but many folk appear to think the message pane(f8) is a preview. It is just one of the three message reader interfaces Thunderbird offers along with the tab and a new window.

Try pressing F8 and see if that is what you mean.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: right click the folder, select properties and then the repair button. Did the whole email disappear? or the content of the email appear?
creator: MattAuSupport
